name: ThornSin
description:
ThornSin is an Adult Action Roguelike Game made by Unity.

We aim for the game to be both entertaining and erotic.

Supports English, Japanese(日本語), Chinese(中文), Korean(한국어).
Real-time combat with fully animated H scenes support.
Explore completely random dungeons.
Constantly updated artifacts and items.
Achievements unlock new items or enemies.
The town of Magheim has been destroyed by an unknown force. Sister Inesa is searching for the cause of the disaster amongst the ruins.

She has a kind and strong heart, yet deep inside there seems to be an unknown aspect that no one knows about.

Now, as she searches for herself and her faith, she sets foot in this land infested with demons and sins.
